summary: This document is an email chain from November 18, 2021, regarding a Sky News interview request for Audrey Strauss, the former Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York. The request is related to the upcoming trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, as Strauss had announced the charges. The emails show the request being forwarded and a colleague being asked to decline on Strauss's behalf.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The subject of a Sky News interview request regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, as she had announced the charges. Colleagues are asked to decline the interview on her behalf.

persons.name: Rebecca Banovic
persons.context: The producer who sent the initial interview request to Audrey Strauss via her husband, seeking an interview about the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Rusty Wing
persons.context: Forwarded the initial Sky News interview request to Audrey Strauss.

connections.description: Banovic, a news producer, is seeking an interview with Strauss regarding her role in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Sky News interview request for Audrey Strauss
events.description: Sky News producer Rebecca Banovic requests an interview with former Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss regarding the upcoming Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: Audrey Strauss, who announced the charges against Ghislaine Maxwell, was sought for a media interview ahead of Maxwell's trial.
The email chain shows a coordinated effort to decline the interview request on Strauss's behalf.
The document highlights continued media interest in the Maxwell trial from international news outlets like Sky News.
